channel.title: Kathleen Breitman on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Kathleen Breitman on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: R3
item.description: Distributed Ledger Group R3 I work at R3. It manages the distributed ledger group, of 42 banks interested in using blockchain or distributed ledger tech. People wonder when I tell them that I work for a consortium that wants to use electronic ledgers. What does that have to do with capital markets? Ledgers can track transactions. Typically in a capital market context, this responsibility falls to the backoffice. After a trade, you finalize it and actually transfer value.
